QuestData.Title: Mirror Making, Not Breaking
QuestData.Description:
Denathrius does not allow mirrors to be erected within the ember ward. His stone servants shatter anything that so much as glints.
I need you to remain vigilant as I make this mirror. I have no doubt that the Master's minions will try to stop us.
Are you ready?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend Laurent and Simone from Stone Legion attackers.
QuestData.RewardText:
Simone is right. We don't have time for idle chatter. Not here, at least.
The mirror we've repaired will take you to safety.
